pr_title: Disable firebase performance plugin to speed up build time

timeline.message: Disable firebase plugin for debug builds

timeline.bodyText:
I didn't realize you could disable it this way, thanks!
One question - for debugging the app, wouldn't we also want this enabled? If so, should we instead have a different [default] variant, e.g. dev, for use during development?
timeline.author: gino-m

replies.bodyText: I guess not. It would be most useful once the app is released.
replies.author: shobhitagarwal1612

replies.bodyText: Ok, let's do this for now then. Thanks!
replies.author: gino-m
